item.text: “At that time the kingdom of heaven will be like 10 virgins who took their lamps and went out to meet the bridegroom.

<st data-num="4002" class="">Five</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">virgins</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3474" class="">foolish</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> were <st data-num="5429" class="">wise</st>.

When<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3474">foolish ones</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2985" class="">lamps</st>, they did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">take</st> extra<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1637">olive oil</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="5429">wise ones</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> <st data-num="30" class="">flasks</st> of <st data-num="1637">olive oil</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2985" class="">lamps</st>.

When<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st> was <st data-num="5549">delayed a long time</st>, they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> became <st data-num="3573" class="">drowsy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2518">fell asleep</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> at <st data-num="3319 3571">midnight</st> there <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="2906" class="">shout</st>, ‘<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st> is here! <st data-num="1831" class="">Come out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="529" class="">meet</st> him.’

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3933" class="">virgins</st> <st data-num="1453">woke up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2885" class="">trimmed</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2985" class="">lamps</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3474">foolish ones</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="5429" class="">wise</st>, ‘<st data-num="1325">Give</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> some <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1637" class="">oil</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2985" class="">lamps</st> are <st data-num="4570">going out</st>.’

‘<st data-num="3756">No</st>,’ <st data-num="5429">they</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>.<n id="1" /> ‘There <st data-num="3361">won’t</st> be <st data-num="714" class="">enough</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>. <st data-num="4198" class="">Go</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">instead</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> those who <st data-num="4453" class="">sell</st> oil <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> some for <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves.’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> while <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> had <st data-num="565" class="">gone</st> to <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> it, the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st> <st data-num="2064">arrived</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those who were <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st> <st data-num="1525">went inside</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1062">wedding banquet</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> was <st data-num="2808" class="">shut</st>.

<st data-num="5305" class="">Later</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3062" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3933" class="">virgins</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">lord</st>! <st data-num="455">Let</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="455" class="">in</st>!’<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you!’</st>
Therefore stay alert because you do not know the day or the hour.
“For it is like a man going on a journey, who summoned his slaves and entrusted his property to them.

To<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">one</st> he <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="5007" class="">talents</st>,<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="3739" class="">another</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">another</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st>, <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">according</st> to <st data-num="2398" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">ability</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="589">went on</st> his <st data-num="589" class="">journey</st>.

The one who had <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="5007" class="">talents</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">went off</st> <st data-num="2112">right away</st> and <st data-num="2038">put his money to work</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2770" class="">gained</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="243" class="">more</st>.

<st data-num="5615">In the same way</st>, the one who had <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2770" class="">gained</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="243" class="">more</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the one who had <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="1520">one</st> talent <st data-num="565">went out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3736" class="">dug a hole</st> in the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2928" class="">hid</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2962">master’s</st> <st data-num="694" class="">money</st> in it.

<st data-num="3326" class="">After</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="4183" class="">long</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st>, the <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> of <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4868" class="">settled</st> his <st data-num="3056" class="">accounts</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

The<n id="1" /> one who had <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> the <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="5007" class="">talents</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="4374" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="243" class="">more</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>,<n id="2" /> you <st data-num="3860" class="">entrusted</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> with <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="5007" class="">talents</st>. <st data-num="2396">See</st>, I have <st data-num="2770" class="">gained</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="243" class="">more.’</st>

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="2095" class="">Well done</st>, <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>! You have <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3641">few things</st>. I will <st data-num="2525" class="">put</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2525">in charge</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4183">many things</st>. <st data-num="1525" class="">Enter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master.’</st>

The<n id="1" /> one with the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5007" class="">talents</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>, you <st data-num="3860" class="">entrusted</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5007" class="">talents</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="2396">See</st>, I have <st data-num="2770" class="">gained</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="243" class="">more.’</st>

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">answered</st>, ‘<st data-num="2095">Well done</st>, <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>! You have <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="3641" class="">few things</st>. I will <st data-num="2525" class="">put</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2525">in charge</st> of <st data-num="4183">many things</st>. <st data-num="1525" class="">Enter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master.’</st>

<st data-num="1161">Then</st> the one who had <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="5007" class="">talent</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>, I <st data-num="1097" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> a <st data-num="4642" class="">hard</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="2325" class="">harvesting</st> <st data-num="3606" class="">where</st> you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">gathering</st> <st data-num="3606" class="">where</st> you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1287">scatter seed</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">so</st><n id="1" /> I was <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>, and I <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="2928" class="">hid</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5007" class="">talent</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>. <st data-num="2396">See</st>, you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> what is <st data-num="4674" class="">yours.’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="4190">Evil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3636" class="">lazy</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>! <st data-num="2532">So</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="2325" class="">harvest</st> <st data-num="3699">where</st> I <st data-num="3756" class="">didn’t</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">gather</st> <st data-num="3606" class="">where</st> I <st data-num="3756" class="">didn’t</st> <st data-num="1287" class="">scatter</st>?

<st data-num="3767">Then</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">should</st> have <st data-num="906" class="">deposited</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="694">money</st> with the <st data-num="5133" class="">bankers</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> on my <st data-num="2064" class="">return</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="302" class="">would</st> have <st data-num="2865" class="">received</st> <st data-num="1699">my</st> money back <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5110" class="">interest</st>!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="5007" class="">talent</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> it to the one who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">10</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the one who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> will be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">more</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will have <st data-num="4052">more than enough</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the one who does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> will be <st data-num="142" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />
And throw that worthless slave into the outer darkness, where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth.’
“When the Son of Man comes in his glory and all the angels with him, then he will sit on his glorious throne.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st> will be <st data-num="4863" class="">assembled</st> <st data-num="1715" class="">before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="873" class="">separate</st> <st data-num="846" class="">people</st> one <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="240" class="">another</st> <st data-num="5618" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4166" class="">shepherd</st> <st data-num="873" class="">separates</st> the <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2056" class="">goats</st>.

He<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2476" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2055" class="">goats</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2176" class="">left</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> will <st data-num="3004">say</st> to those <st data-num="1537" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st>, ‘<st data-num="1204">Come</st>, you who are <st data-num="2127" class="">blessed</st> by <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="2816" class="">inherit</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="2090" class="">prepared</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2602" class="">foundation</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I was <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">food</st>, I was <st data-num="1372" class="">thirsty</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="4222" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> something <st data-num="4222">to drink</st>, I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="3581" class="">stranger</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="4863" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> in,

I was <st data-num="1131" class="">naked</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="4016">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4016" class="">clothing</st>, I was <st data-num="770" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="1980">took care</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="2064" class="">visited</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me.’</st>

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> will <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="4219" class="">when</st> did we <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5142" class="">feed</st> you, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1372" class="">thirsty</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4222" class="">give</st> you something <st data-num="4222">to drink</st>?

<st data-num="4219" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> did we <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> a <st data-num="3581" class="">stranger</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">invite</st> you in, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1131" class="">naked</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4016" class="">clothe</st> you?

<st data-num="4219" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> did we <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="770" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">visit</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you?’</st>
And the king will answer them, ‘I tell you the truth, just as you did it for one of the least of these brothers or sisters of mine, you did it for me.’
“Then he will say to those on his left, ‘Depart from me, you accursed, into the eternal fire that has been prepared for the devil and his angels!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I was <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="1325">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">nothing</st> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>, I was <st data-num="1372" class="">thirsty</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="4222">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">nothing</st> to <st data-num="4222" class="">drink</st>.

I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="3581" class="">stranger</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4863">as a guest</st>, <st data-num="1131" class="">naked</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4016" class="">clothe</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="772" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1980" class="">visit</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me.’</st>

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> will <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="4219" class="">when</st> did we <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1372" class="">thirsty</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="3581" class="">stranger</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1131" class="">naked</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="772" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1247" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1247">whatever</st> you <st data-num="1247" class="">needed?’</st>

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he will <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909 3745">just as</st> you did <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> it for <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="1646" class="">least</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st>, you did <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> it for <st data-num="1473" class="">me.’</st>
And these will depart into eternal punishment, but the righteous into eternal life.”
